amenity.description: Descirbes useful and important facilities for visitors and residents

building.description: Is used to mark a given object as a building

description.description: Is used to add additional information

name.description: Identifies the name of the cinema

email.description: Identifies the e-mail ralated to the cinema

phone.description: Identifies the e-mail ralated to the cinema

website.description: Identifies the website related to the cinema

addr:city.description: Identifies in term of cites the position of the cinema

addr:country.description: Identifies in term of state the position of the cinema

addr:housenumber.description: Identifies the hosenumber of the cinema

addr:postcode.description: Identifies the postcode of the cites where the cinema is located

addr:street.description: Identifies the street name where the cinema is located

cinema:3D.description: Indentifies the possibility or not to watch 3D projection

contact:phone.description: Identifies the hosenumber of the cinema

contact:website.description: Identifies the website related to the cinema

drive_in.description: Indicate if a cinema is a drive-in cinema

operator.description: Indicate the main operator of the cinema

ref:vatin.description: VAT identification number of an object

wheelchair.description: Identifies the possibility or not to access with a wheelchair

coordinates.description: array the points which compose the polygon
